GTFS Toolkit¶

This is a Python 3.4 tool kit for processing General Transit Feed Specification (GTFS) data in memory without a database. It’s mostly for computing network-level statistics, such as mean daily service distance per route and mean daily number of vehicles per stop. Uses Pandas and Shapely to do the heavy lifting.

Installation¶

pip install gtfstk

Examples¶

Play with examples/examples.ipynb in a Jupyter notebook
